ygData.subject: RE: Re: [EverQuest] Playstation
ygData.msgSnippet: People who play a lot get a shot at betatesting, its in no way exclusive to the legends subscribers. Its a quite well known fact that people on legends are
ygData.messageBody:
People who play a lot get a shot at betatesting, its in no way exclusive to
the legends subscribers. Its a quite well known fact that people on legends
are more "addicted" to eq and play a lot more than the average eq player.
its *not* related to the amount of cash they pour in, its more tied to
playing hours.

And really, its not that fancy to play in beta , its nothing to envy.

/R

-----Original Message-----
From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 14, 2002 1:24 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Playstation


Excuse me, but I am the moderator and I will judge what can be said. I
decide who lives or dies! MWAHAHAHAHAHAHA.
Anyways, it is NOT an unfounded rumor. It is true according to Sony on their
official everquest2 website. So please don't start insulting other posters.
luv,
-Su

> Yeah, it would be a real bitch if those who actually pay more than some
> get's to see it first =/ Ohh, not to mention that they will pay $40/month
to
> betatest EQ2 lol. But anyhow, spreading rumors ain't my thing. So just
> wanted to add that and say, don't spread the shit untill you know the
facts.
> =P
>
